item.title: Digital detox
item.description: The norm: be available anywhere at any time Have you ever had the feeling that you couldn’t think straight because of too much information? That’s what was happening to me regularly at the end of 2021. Instant messaging created a mental over-stimulation that led to an overflow of ideas. I became unable to concentrate, to sort things out and to clearly identify the different tasks I had to do in order to prioritise them. The norm in 2021 was for everyone to be available in real time on messengers such as Messenger or Whatsapp.

item.title: Les alternatives à Google
item.description: The GAFAs empire is sprawling. These American companies offer free ingenious tools at the cutting edge of technology. technology. But at what price?

item.title: Making your own bread
item.description: After several attempts and dozens of bakings, I present you my favorite recipe. All of this without a bread maker!
